name: American Resource & Energy
tag_list: wind-turibine-towers, monopoles, micro-wind-turbines, tower-raising-systems, renewable-education-systems, wind-energy-solutions, alternative-energy-products, wind-power, small-wind, community-wind, distributed-wind, wind-turbine-instillation, lattice-towe
overview: American Resource & Energy (ARE) designs, engineers, manufactures and ships monopole wind towers, tower raising systems and portable foundation systems for wind turbines up to 100kW. ARE has designed towers for hundreds of turbine manufacturers around the world, designing and manufacturing wind tower systems that meet the highest safety and quality standards. ARE’s products range from conventional monopoles to portable energy use solutions, educational systems, micro turbine applications and revolutionary self-raising wind tower systems.
